list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Activity Week1 - using NumPy Tasks: Print the average temperature for a week. Find the highest and lowest temperature recorded. Convert all temperatures to Fahrenheit and print the result. (Formula: F = C * 9/5 + 32) Identify the days (by index) where the temperature was above 20째C.
Help syntax:
import numpy as np
temperatures = np.array([18.5, 19, 20, 25.0, 2, 30, 13.9])
